name: Quantity
description: Delivering high quality patient care and customer service are our highest priorities.

name: Compassion
description: Delivering care with empathy, respect and dignity and treating everyone fairly.

name: Integrity
description: Emergency Ambulance Service was built on integrity. We believe in honesty, responsibility and hard work.

name: Timeliness
description: Reducing waits and delays for both those who receive and who give care.

name: Communications
description: Listening to and supporting each other, and creating an environment that seeks and hears the voice of customers.

name: Safety
description: Promoting a culture of respect and accountability that provides the highest degree of safety to our patients and caregivers.
